text: has anyone worked with depositfix + stripe  form integration?
no takers?
I'd be curious to know about that one too, I found it and am considering using it for an upcoming project.
<@UBUNBSM24>, it seems pretty straight forward. Assuming you are working with one price/ form.  My client wants 10dif prices and i cannot seem to find a way to dynamically change the price
and they are pretty set on this integration
It did look easy, although I haven't checked out the details. Yours sounds more complex, my client has one product :slightly_smiling_face:
should be good for t hat
i also got a bunch of console warnings from stripe if i had more than one form on a page
so hiding forms and revealing with a select is out
probably gonna have 10 pages
:disappointed:

What are some things you run into when QC'ing a HubSpot site (more like out of the box then a custom coded template)? I am trying to put a list together for our QC people of things like:
- HS Wraps modules in divs with classes on them, so dont worry about the extra markup you see
- Theres only one breakpoint (when using drag and drop builder) of 768px
- Images are resized and compressed when uploaded to file manager
AJ do you think it would be helpful to have developer documentation on all of the "magic" and architecture of HubSpot CMS sites? (something to demystify any magic)

yes, i think it would be awesome to have that. I know our QC people have often times called out issues or things on HS sites where I had to explain to them why X functions this way and why Y shows as this
Thanks for the feedback!
lol Will I hope you post that with a version of your hair photo with a wizard hat on “Demystifying the wizarding world of HubSpot”
:will:
<@UBUNBSM24>, in case you wanted multiple products, I have a solution!
Thanks! I'll save that in case I need it :slightly_smiling_face:
can i make a custom module with that form code and use a repeater for the products array?
so end user can add/subtract as necessary?
yep

Hey everyone! Does anybody know how to place a HubSpot form script in a Drupal 8 custom block? I've been doing some research and the docs are saying that I should add the script to the whole theme. Is this necessary when the script is really small?
drupal..
isnt there a HubSpot module for drupal?
`<https://www.drupal.org/project/HubSpot_forms>`
i added a form to a drupal custom block once.  Worked fine.  had to make sure to add the target to make sure it stayed put
Hey <@UD53A9UUR>, the text editor doesn't want to save the script. I am going to check the module you sent over now. Thanks for that!
you have to make sure that the text editor accepts all tags
forget teh setting off the top of my head..
otherwise it will strip them
<@UD53A9UUR> Do you mean Full HTML under Text Format drop down?
yeah
It still strips the script :disappointed:
`<https://drupal.stackexchange.com/questions/40235/how-to-stop-ckeditor-3-6-3-7474-from-stripping-script-tags>`
if you can get around adding through a rich text editor, that would be better, though.
Thanks <@UD53A9UUR>. I'll update here if I can solve it :crossed_fingers:
good luck.  :rainbow:
